update: - Update the current project to the latest version of Boiler.
jshint: - Search for errors in the application (used by build).
server: - Start a web server for development (used by start).
start: - Start all the necessary tasks for development.
watch: - Watch for changes in application (used by start).
webpack: - Precompile the application for development (used by start).
webpack-build: - Precompile the application for production (used by build).
